item.title: A Transactional Perspective on Execute Order Validate Blockchains——Sigmod2020
item.description: A Transactional Perspective on Execute-order-validate Blockchains(Sigmod2020) 作者开源了FabricSharp项目代码 https://github.com/ooibc88/FabricSharp Introduction 受数据库领域的乐观并发控制锁的启发，提出了一种对于增强EOV(execute-ord
